description: Maps each Codex module family into Structural, Semantic, Temporal, and Identity layers.

structural.description: Core architecture, specs, schemas, and protocols.

semantic.description: Meaning, myth, scroll language, narrative frameworks.

temporal.description: Timelines, phases, activation windows, and cyclical patterns.

identity.description: Who Arkadia and Arkana are, why they exist, and how they must behave.

query_routing_hint: For any user question, identify which primary layer is being touched first (structural, semantic, temporal, identity) and bias retrieval from that layer’s anchors before blending with the others.
